title: How many numbers are in 1,000 digits? - Quora

response.answer_text: Who can say? Could be 1000 1-digit numbers. Could be 500 2-digit numbers. Could be 1 1000-digit number. Could be 2 1-digit numbers and 499 2-digit numbers. Could be 5 6-digit numbers, 100 3-digit numbers, 25 2-digit numbers, 20 8-digit numbers, and 23 20-digit numbers. And so on and so on. Live long and prosper!
We have: 1 number of 1000 digits2 numbers of 999 digits3 numbers of 998 digits……1000 numbers of 1 digitSo the answer is 1+2+3+….1000 = 1000 * 1001 / 2 = 500,500 numbers.
